column4: hi all.  am serously struggling to install 64bit 7.04 on notebook
any more details?
acpi=off might be a better option.  also "pci=routeirq".  for someone else with a compaq acpi=off helped.
wish i new that 2 years ago :)
no worries you will get it working, probably
shot.  will try now.  takes sooo long with the graphical instaler.  must admit, prefered the previous one
use the text mode installer
do i need the alternate cd to get text installer?
yea
try acpi=off on normal one
it may be faster
am trying
eish, it takes long to boot the desktop cd.
the cd booted, but has a logon screen..  is there a standard username?
just wait 30 seconds
by 30seconds, do u mean wait for u to finish helping other? or that it should auto login?
auto ogin
sorry to hound, but any idea of the username? or should i restart?
username for what?  where?
live cd giving me logon screen?
it says at the bottom usually.  wait 10 seconds or a minute
no such thing.  will reboot
